A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Do yourself a favor\, and go watch this movie\, ignore the bad reviews and give it a try. Watch it twice and take a moment to see it beyond the action. IMHO\, This movie was great\, exploring the \"gray\" side of the force is something I been looking foward to since KOTOR. Also going back to a more mystical aspect of the force vs the midichlorians crap was a welcoming change.
